discovery_questions.tell_me_about_yourself: i'm not getting enough sleep - only 3-4 hours and decent quality
discovery_questions.exercise_routine: I've been very tired, just not sleeping enough
discovery_questions.sleep_habits: 3 meals a day - good healthy foods that I cook  maybe 3 eggs and a bagel for breakfast, two sandwiches and some chips for lunch, and typically something heavier for dinner, with a good balance of protein, vegetables, carbs, and other important nutrients
discovery_questions.eating_habits: I like to scroll on social media to unwind
discovery_questions.free_time: mostly evening, but also can be throughout the day. It's typically about 2-4 hours longer than I should spend though

goals.goal: improving my sleep - that is, getting more sleep per night I want to see if i can hit that schedule for 3 nights out of the week to start, but to aim for hitting this consistenly by the end of the four weeks
It feels pretty realistic just aim for it 3 times, same as my sleep goal same days as my sleep goal, since i feel like doing less social media time will inherently help me hit my sleep goal

goals_to_keep: improving my sleep - that is, getting more sleep per night I want to see if i can hit that schedule for 3 nights out of the week to start, but to aim for hitting this consistenly by the end of the four weeks
It feels pretty realistic just aim for it 3 times, same as my sleep goal same days as my sleep goal, since i feel like doing less social media time will inherently help me hit my sleep goal
successes: honestly, it went well, it wasn't that challenging to achieve my goals, surprisingly

chat_history.content: [START_SESSION]
Hi Taiyo, welcome back to Session 3! It's great to see you again. How did your week go with working on your sleep and social media goals?
it went well!
That's wonderful to hear! Can you tell me a bit more about what went well - did you manage to hit your sleep schedule those 3 nights you were aiming for?
yes
That's fantastic, Taiyo! So you hit your sleep schedule 3 nights this week - that's exactly what you were aiming for. How are you feeling about that accomplishment?
i feel great!
I'm so glad to hear that! It sounds like you're making real progress. On a scale of 1 to 10, how stressed were you this week?
not that stressed, since I'd done well to manage my time. about a 3

That's great that you're feeling less stressed and managing your time well - staying at a 3 is a positive sign. Now looking ahead to next week, what would you like to focus on for your goals? You have three options: keep working on the same goals as last week, keep those goals and add a new one, or set completely new goals. What feels right for you?
same goals
Perfect, you're sticking with your sleep and social media goals. What went well this week? What was challenging?
honestly, it went well, it wasn't that challenging to achieve my goals, surprisingly
That's wonderful that it felt easier than expected. Is there anything about these goals that needs to be changed or worked on?
i want to aim for hitting these everyday for the last week
So just to make sure I understand correctly - you want to aim for getting better sleep and reducing social media time every day next week, instead of just 3 days? Is that right?
yes

That sounds like a great progression since you've been doing so well. On a scale of 1 to 10, how confident are you that you can achieve this goal of hitting your sleep and social media targets every day next week?
That's excellent confidence. Since this is our final week together, what tracking method will you use to keep yourself accountable for hitting these goals every day?
i journal everyday, and i do positive reinforcement to hit my goals there, and then I make sure to set reminders on my calendars, clock apps, and have the app limits still up

That's a really solid system you've built - journaling with positive reinforcement, multiple reminders, and app limits all working together. It sounds like you've set yourself up well to succeed this final week and beyond. How are you feeling about wrapping up our sessions and continuing on your own?
i feel good!

I'm so glad to hear that. You've made real progress over these four weeks - from hitting your sleep and social media goals 3 times a week to now aiming for every day, and you've built strong systems to support yourself. I'm confident you'll keep this momentum going. Is there anything else you'd like to discuss before we wrap up today?
no

Great work these past four weeks, Taiyo! You've built some really strong habits around sleep and social media use, and you have solid systems in place to keep yourself on track. Best of luck continuing with your goals. Take care!
